mapper.insert: insert into useditem values( useditem_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, #{price}, #{location}, 'n', #{imagefolder}, #{thumbnail}, 0, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{deadline})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from (select * from useditem where location like '%' || #{neighborhood} || '%') where subject like '%' || #{search} || '%' or content like '%' || #{search} || '%' order by sold asc, decode(location, #{location}, 1) ) a ) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
